activitypub.title: ActivityPub
activitypub.noActivity: No activity yet. Once your actor is federated, interactions will appear here.

profile.title: Profile
profile.intro: Edit how your actor appears to other fediverse users. Changes take effect immediately.
profile.nameHint: Your name as shown on your fediverse profile
profile.summaryHint: A short description of yourself. HTML is allowed.
profile.urlHint: Your website address, shown as a link on your profile
profile.iconHint: URL to your profile picture (square, at least 400x400px recommended)
profile.imageHint: URL to a banner image shown at the top of your profile
profile.manualApprovalHint: When enabled, follow requests require your approval before they take effect
profile.authorizedFetchHint: When enabled, only servers with valid HTTP Signatures can fetch your actor and collections. This improves privacy but may reduce compatibility with some clients.
profile.saved: Profile saved. Changes are now visible to the fediverse.

migrate.title: Mastodon migration
migrate.intro: This guide walks you through moving your Mastodon identity to your IndieWeb site. Complete each step in order — your existing followers will be notified and can re-follow you automatically.
migrate.step1Desc: Tell the fediverse that your old Mastodon account and this site belong to the same person. This sets the alsoKnownAs property on your ActivityPub actor, which Mastodon checks before allowing a Move.
migrate.aliasHint: The full URL of your Mastodon profile, e.g. https://mstdn.social/users/rmdes
migrate.step2Desc: Upload the CSV files from your Mastodon data export to bring over your connections. Go to your Mastodon instance → Preferences → Import and export → Data export to download them.
migrate.fileHint: Select a CSV file from your Mastodon data export (e.g. following_accounts.csv or followers.csv)
migrate.importFollowingHint: Accounts you follow — they will appear in your Following list immediately
migrate.importFollowersHint: Your current followers — they will be recorded as pending until they re-follow you after the Move in step 3
migrate.step3Desc: Once you have saved your alias and imported your data, go to your Mastodon instance → Preferences → Account → Move to a different account. Enter your new fediverse handle and confirm. Mastodon will notify all your followers, and those whose servers support it will automatically re-follow you here. This step is irreversible — your old account will become a redirect.
migrate.errorNoFile: Please select a CSV file before importing.
migrate.aliasSuccess: Alias saved — your actor document now includes this account as alsoKnownAs.
